name: 68publishers/smart-nette-component
description: Features for Nette Components and Presenters. Authorization via annotations, template resolving and overloading etc. ...

suggest.kdyby/annotations: You could use this package as Doctrine Annotations provider.
suggest.nettrine/annotations: You could use this package as Doctrine Annotations provider.
suggest.kdyby/translation: If you want to use ITranslatorAware interface for automatic Translator injections into our services.
